GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.10.132
GSD.description:
tracing/histograms: Fix memory leak problem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit 78a1400c42ee11197eb1f0f85ba51df9a4fdfff0, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 46bbe5c671e06f070428b9be142cc4ee5cedebac. For more details please see the references link.
